short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Welcome to Haloria.com Holliday Rental Apartments in Florence, Italy

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
About Haloria: Haloria, is an agency that operate for more than 8 years in providing affordable luxuries touristic apartments in the beautiful Florence.

They have over 40 beautiful apartments all over the city , you can Check all properties on www.haloria.com

The agency focus on offering a customized high quality services, all apartments are equipped with quality furniture , wifi, and all different amenities. in addition in all apartments the guest can use the discount card and map. 


Use this extension as a shortcut to the website on your browser toolbar
